thread.title: ISRO attempts new world record, will launch 104 satellites
thread.title_full: ISRO attempts new world record, will launch 104 satellites

title: ISRO attempts new world record, will launch 104 satellites
text:
Â» ISRO creates world record, launches 104 satellites ISRO creates world record, launches 104 satellites In attempt to break Russia's record, ISRO will also try to break its own record Updated: Wednesday, February 15, 2017, 10:06 [IST] Subscribe to Oneindia News 
Sriharikota, Feb 15: On Wednesday, ISRO created a world record by launching 104 satellites in a single flight of PSLVC 37 from Sriharikota, Andhra Pradesh. 
In attempt to break Russia's record, ISRO will also try to break its own record. ISRO sucessfully launched PSLVC 37 and even completed the phase three of ignition. The entire launch is expected to last for 28 minutes. Representational image 
With this launch, India become the first country to launch more than 100 satellites under single mission. The 104 satellites will be carried by ISRO's workhorse Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle PSLV-C37, which will be going on its 39th mission. PSLV-C37 / Cartosat-2 series Mission Lift off Normal as expected. 
The satellites were blasted off from the SDSC SHAR Sriharikota, Andhra Pradesh moments ago. 
OneIndia News
